mipMIB.name: mipMIB
mipMIB.contactinfo: David Cong Postal: Motorola 1301 E. Algonquin Rd. Schaumburg, IL 60196 Phone: +1-847-576-1357 Email: cong@comm.mot.com
mipMIB.description: The MIB Module for the Mobile IP.

RegistrationFlags.name: RegistrationFlags
RegistrationFlags.description: This data type is used to define the registration flags for Mobile IP registration extension: vjCompression -- Request to use VJ compression gre -- Request to use GRE minEnc -- Request to use minimal encapsulation decapsulationByMN -- Decapsulation by mobile node broadcastDatagram -- Request to receive broadcasts simultaneoursBindings -- Request to retain prior binding(s).

mipEntities.name: mipEntities
mipEntities.description: This object describes which Mobile IP entities are supported by this managed entity. The entity may support more than one Mobile IP entities. For example, the entity supports both Foreign Agent (FA) and Home Agent (HA). Therefore, bit 1 and bit 2 are set to 1 for this object.

mipEnable.name: mipEnable
mipEnable.description: Indicates whether the Mobile IP protocol should be enabled for the managed entity. If it is disabled, the entity should disable both agent discovery and registration functions.

mipEncapsulationSupported.name: mipEncapsulationSupported
mipEncapsulationSupported.description: Encapsulation methods supported by the Mobile IP entity. The entity may support multiple encapsulation methods or none of them: ipInIp(0), -- IP Encapsulation within IP gre(1), -- Generic Routing Encapsulation, -- refers to RFC1701 minEnc(2), -- Minimal Encapsulation within IP.

mipSecAssocTable.name: mipSecAssocTable
mipSecAssocTable.description: A table containing Mobility Security Associations.

mipSecPeerAddress.name: mipSecPeerAddress
mipSecPeerAddress.description: The IP address of the peer entity with which this node shares the mobility security association.

mipSecSPI.name: mipSecSPI
mipSecSPI.description: The SPI is the 4-byte opaque index within the Mobility Security Association which selects the specific security parameters to be used to authenticate the peer, i.e. the rest of the variables in this MipSecAssocEntry.

mipSecAlgorithmMode.name: mipSecAlgorithmMode
mipSecAlgorithmMode.description: Security mode used by this algorithm.

mipSecKey.name: mipSecKey
mipSecKey.description: The shared secret key for the security associations. Reading this object will always return zero length value.

mipSecReplayMethod.name: mipSecReplayMethod
mipSecReplayMethod.description: The replay-protection method supported for this SPI within this Mobility Security Association.

mipSecTotalViolations.name: mipSecTotalViolations
mipSecTotalViolations.description: Total number of security violations in the entity

mipSecViolationTable.name: mipSecViolationTable
mipSecViolationTable.description: A table containing information about security violations.

mipSecViolationEntry.name: mipSecViolationEntry
mipSecViolationEntry.description: Information about one particular security violation.

mipSecViolatorAddress.name: mipSecViolatorAddress
mipSecViolatorAddress.description: Violator's IP address. The violator is not necessary in the mipSecAssocTable.

mipSecViolationCounter.name: mipSecViolationCounter
mipSecViolationCounter.description: Total number of security violations for this peer.

mipSecRecentViolationSPI.name: mipSecRecentViolationSPI
mipSecRecentViolationSPI.description: SPI of the most recent security violation for this peer. If the security violation is due to an identification mismatch, then this is the SPI from the Mobile-Home Authentication Extension. If the security violation is due to an invalid authenticator, then this is the SPI from the offending authentication extension. In all other cases, it should be set to zero.

mipSecRecentViolationTime.name: mipSecRecentViolationTime
mipSecRecentViolationTime.description: Time of the most recent security violation for this peer.

mipSecRecentViolationIDLow.name: mipSecRecentViolationIDLow
mipSecRecentViolationIDLow.description: Low-order 32 bits of identification used in request or reply of the most recent security violation for this peer.

mipSecRecentViolationIDHigh.name: mipSecRecentViolationIDHigh
mipSecRecentViolationIDHigh.description: High-order 32 bits of identification used in request or reply of the most recent security violation for this peer.

mipSecRecentViolationReason.name: mipSecRecentViolationReason
mipSecRecentViolationReason.description: Reason for the most recent security violation for this peer.

mnState.name: mnState
mnState.description: Indicates mobile node's state of Mobile IP: home, -- MN is connected to home network. registered, -- MN has registered on foreign network pending, -- MN has sent registration request and is waiting for the reply isolated, -- MN is isolated from network unknown -- MN can not determine its state.

mnHomeAddress.name: mnHomeAddress
mnHomeAddress.description: An IP address that is assigned for an extended period of time to the mobile node. It remains unchanged regardless of the mobile node's current point of attachment.

mnHATable.name: mnHATable
mnHATable.description: A table containing all of the mobile node's potential home agents.

mnHAEntry.name: mnHAEntry
mnHAEntry.description: Information for a particular Home Agent.

mnHAAddress.name: mnHAAddress
mnHAAddress.description: IP address of mobile node's Home Agent.

mnCurrentHA.name: mnCurrentHA
mnCurrentHA.description: Whether this home agent is the current home agent for the mobile node. If it is true, the mobile node is registered with that home agent.

mnHAStatus.name: mnHAStatus
mnHAStatus.description: The row status for this home agent entry. If the status is set to 'createAndGo' or 'active', then the mobile node can use mnHAAddress as a valid candidate for a home agent. If the status is set to 'destroy', then the mobile node should delete this row, and deregister from that home agent.

mnFATable.name: mnFATable
mnFATable.description: A table containing all foreign agents that the mobile node knows about and their corresponding COA (care-of address). This COA is an address of a foreign agent with which the mobile node is registered. The table is updated when advertisements are received by the mobile node. If an advertisement expires, its entry(s) should be deleted from the table. One foreign agent can provide more than one COA in its advertisements.

mnFAEntry.name: mnFAEntry
mnFAEntry.description: One pair of foreign agent IP address and COA for that foreign agent.

mnCOA.name: mnCOA
mnCOA.description: A care-of address being offered by this foreign agent or a co-located care-of address which the mobile node has associated with one of its own network interfaces.

mnAdvSourceAddress.name: mnAdvSourceAddress
mnAdvSourceAddress.description: The source IP address of the most recently received Agent Advertisement. This address could be the address of a home agent or a foreign agent.

mnAdvSequence.name: mnAdvSequence
mnAdvSequence.description: The sequence number of the most recently received advertisement. The sequence number ranges from 0 to 0xffff. After the sequence number attains the value 0xffff, it will roll over to 256.

mnAdvFlags.name: mnAdvFlags
mnAdvFlags.description: The flags are contained in the 7th byte in the extension of the most recently received mobility agent advertisement: vjCompression -- Agent supports Van Jacobson compression gre -- Agent offers Generice Routing Encapsulation minEnc, -- Agent offers Minimal Encapsulation foreignAgent, -- Agent is a Foreign Agent homeAgent, -- Agent is a Home Agent busy, -- Foreign Agent is busy regRequired, -- FA registration is required.

mnAdvMaxRegLifetime.name: mnAdvMaxRegLifetime
mnAdvMaxRegLifetime.description: The longest lifetime in seconds that the agent is willing to accept in any registration request.

mnAdvMaxAdvLifetime.name: mnAdvMaxAdvLifetime
mnAdvMaxAdvLifetime.description: The maximum length of time that the Advertisement is considered valid in the absence of further Advertisements.

mnAdvTimeReceived.name: mnAdvTimeReceived
mnAdvTimeReceived.description: The time at which the most recently received advertisement was received.

mnSolicitationsSent.name: mnSolicitationsSent
mnSolicitationsSent.description: Total number of Solicitation sent by the mobile node.

mnAdvertisementsReceived.name: mnAdvertisementsReceived
mnAdvertisementsReceived.description: Total number of advertisements received by the mobile node.

mnAdvsDroppedInvalidExtension.name: mnAdvsDroppedInvalidExtension
mnAdvsDroppedInvalidExtension.description: Total number of advertisements dropped by the mobile node due to both poorly formed extensions and unrecognized extensions with extension number in the range 0-127.

mnAdvsIgnoredUnknownExtension.name: mnAdvsIgnoredUnknownExtension
mnAdvsIgnoredUnknownExtension.description: Total number of unrecognized extensions in the range 128-255 that were ignored by the mobile node.

mnMoveFromHAToFA.name: mnMoveFromHAToFA
mnMoveFromHAToFA.description: Number of times that the mobile node has decided to move from its home network to a foreign network.

mnMoveFromFAToFA.name: mnMoveFromFAToFA
mnMoveFromFAToFA.description: Number of times that the mobile node has decided to move from one foreign network to another foreign network.

mnMoveFromFAToHA.name: mnMoveFromFAToHA
mnMoveFromFAToHA.description: Number of times that the mobile node has decided to move from a foreign network to its home network.

mnGratuitousARPsSend.name: mnGratuitousARPsSend
mnGratuitousARPsSend.description: Total number of Gratuitous ARPs sent by mobile node in order to clear out any stale ARP entries in the ARP caches of nodes on the home network.

mnAgentRebootsDectected.name: mnAgentRebootsDectected
mnAgentRebootsDectected.description: Total number of agent reboots detected by the mobile node through sequence number of the advertisement.

mnRegistrationTable.name: mnRegistrationTable
mnRegistrationTable.description: A table containing information about the mobile node's attempted registration(s). The mobile node updates this table based upon Registration Requests sent and Registration Replies received in response to these requests. Certain variables within this table are also updated if when Registration Requests are retransmitted.

mnRegAgentAddress.name: mnRegAgentAddress
mnRegAgentAddress.description: IP address of the agent as used in the destination IP address of the Registration Request. The agent may be a home agent or a foreign agent.

mnRegFlags.name: mnRegFlags
mnRegFlags.description: Registration flags sent by the mobile node. It is the second byte in the Mobile IP Registratation Request message.

mnRegIDLow.name: mnRegIDLow
mnRegIDLow.description: Low-order 32 bits of the Identification used in that registration by the mobile node.

mnRegIDHigh.name: mnRegIDHigh
mnRegIDHigh.description: High-order 32 bits of the Identification used in that registration by the mobile node.

mnRegTimeRequested.name: mnRegTimeRequested
mnRegTimeRequested.description: If the registration is pending, then this is the lifetime requested by the mobile node (in seconds). If the registration has been accepted, then this is the lifetime actually granted by the home agent in the reply.

mnRegTimeRemaining.name: mnRegTimeRemaining
mnRegTimeRemaining.description: The number of seconds remaining until this registration expires. It has the same initial value as mnRegTimeRequested and is only valid if mnRegIsAccepted is TRUE.

mnRegTimeSent.name: mnRegTimeSent
mnRegTimeSent.description: The time when the last (re-)transmission occured.

mnRegIsAccepted.name: mnRegIsAccepted
mnRegIsAccepted.description: true(1) if the mobile node has received a Registration Reply indicating that service has been accepted; false(2) otherwise. false(2) implies that the registration is still pending.

mnCOAIsLocal.name: mnCOAIsLocal
mnCOAIsLocal.description: Whether the COA is local to (dynamically acquired by) the mobile node or not. If it is false(2), the COA is an address of the foreign agent.

mnRegRequestsSent.name: mnRegRequestsSent
mnRegRequestsSent.description: Total number of registration requests sent by the mobile node. This does not include deregistrations (those with Lifetime equal to zero).

mnDeRegRequestsSent.name: mnDeRegRequestsSent
mnDeRegRequestsSent.description: Total number of deregistration requests sent by the mobile node (those with Lifetime equal to zero).

mnRegRepliesRecieved.name: mnRegRepliesRecieved
mnRegRepliesRecieved.description: Total number of registration replies received by the mobile node in which the Lifetime is greater than zero.

mnDeRegRepliesRecieved.name: mnDeRegRepliesRecieved
mnDeRegRepliesRecieved.description: Total number of (de)registration replies received by the mobile node in which the Lifetime is equal to zero.

mnRepliesInvalidHomeAddress.name: mnRepliesInvalidHomeAddress
mnRepliesInvalidHomeAddress.description: Total number of replies with invalid home address for the mobile node.

mnRepliesUnknownHA.name: mnRepliesUnknownHA
mnRepliesUnknownHA.description: Total number of replies with unknown home agents (not in home agent table).

mnRepliesUnknownFA.name: mnRepliesUnknownFA
mnRepliesUnknownFA.description: Total number of replies with unknown foreign agents if replies relayed through foreign agent.

mnRepliesInvalidID.name: mnRepliesInvalidID
mnRepliesInvalidID.description: Total number of replies with invalid Identification fields.

mnRepliesDroppedInvalidExtension.name: mnRepliesDroppedInvalidExtension
mnRepliesDroppedInvalidExtension.description: Total number of Registration Replies dropped by the mobile node due to both poorly formed extensions and unrecognized extensions with extension number in the range 0-127.

mnRepliesIgnoredUnknownExtension.name: mnRepliesIgnoredUnknownExtension
mnRepliesIgnoredUnknownExtension.description: Total number of Registration Replies that contained one or more unrecognized extensions in the range 128-255 that were ignored by the mobile node.

mnRepliesHAAuthenticationFailure.name: mnRepliesHAAuthenticationFailure
mnRepliesHAAuthenticationFailure.description: Total number of replies without a valid Home Agent to Mobile Node authenticator.

mnRepliesFAAuthenticationFailure.name: mnRepliesFAAuthenticationFailure
mnRepliesFAAuthenticationFailure.description: Total number of replies without a valid Foreign Agent to Mobile Node authenticator.

mnRegRequestsAccepted.name: mnRegRequestsAccepted
mnRegRequestsAccepted.description: Total number of registration requests accepted by the mobile node's home agent (Code 0 and Code 1).

mnRegRequestsDeniedByHA.name: mnRegRequestsDeniedByHA
mnRegRequestsDeniedByHA.description: Total number of registration requests denied by mobile node's home agent (Sum of Code 128 through Code 191).

mnRegRequestsDeniedByFA.name: mnRegRequestsDeniedByFA
mnRegRequestsDeniedByFA.description: Total number of registration requests denied by the foreign agent (Sum of Codes 64 through Code 127).

mnRegRequestsDeniedByHADueToID.name: mnRegRequestsDeniedByHADueToID
mnRegRequestsDeniedByHADueToID.description: Total number of Registration Request denied by home agent due to identification mismatch.

mnRegRequestsWithDirectedBroadcast.name: mnRegRequestsWithDirectedBroadcast
mnRegRequestsWithDirectedBroadcast.description: Total number of Registration Requests sent by mobile node with a directed broadcast address in the home agent field.

maAdvConfigTable.name: maAdvConfigTable
maAdvConfigTable.description: A table containing configurable advertisement parameters for all advertisement interfaces in the mobility agent.

maAdvConfigEntry.name: maAdvConfigEntry
maAdvConfigEntry.description: Advertisement parameters for one advertisement interface.

maAdvMaxRegLifetime.name: maAdvMaxRegLifetime
maAdvMaxRegLifetime.description: The longest lifetime in seconds that mobility agent is willing to accept in any Registration Request.

maAdvPrefixLengthInclusion.name: maAdvPrefixLengthInclusion
maAdvPrefixLengthInclusion.description: Whether the advertisement should include the Prefix- Lengths Extension. If it is true, all advertisements sent over this interface should include the Prefix-Lengths Extension.

maAdvAddress.name: maAdvAddress
maAdvAddress.description: The IP destination address to be used for advertisements sent from the interface. The only permissible values are the all-systems multicast address (224.0.0.1) or the limited-broadcast address (255.255.255.255).

maAdvMaxInterval.name: maAdvMaxInterval
maAdvMaxInterval.description: The maximum time in seconds between successive transmissions of Agent Advertisements from this interface.

maAdvMinInterval.name: maAdvMinInterval
maAdvMinInterval.description: The minimum time in seconds between successive transmissions of Agent Advertisements from this interface.

maAdvMaxAdvLifetime.name: maAdvMaxAdvLifetime
maAdvMaxAdvLifetime.description: The time (in seconds) to be placed in the Lifetime field of the RFC 1256-portion of the Agent Advertisements sent over this interface.

maAdvResponseSolicitationOnly.name: maAdvResponseSolicitationOnly
maAdvResponseSolicitationOnly.description: The flag indicates whether the advertisement from that interface should be sent only in response to an Agent Solicitation message.

maAdvStatus.name: maAdvStatus
maAdvStatus.description: The row status for the agent advertisement table. If this column status is 'active', the manager should not change any column in the row.

maAdvertisementsSent.name: maAdvertisementsSent
maAdvertisementsSent.description: Total number of advertisements sent by the mobility agent.

maAdvsSentForSolicitation.name: maAdvsSentForSolicitation
maAdvsSentForSolicitation.description: Total number of advertisements sent by mobility agent in response to mobile node solicitations.

maSolicitationsReceived.name: maSolicitationsReceived
maSolicitationsReceived.description: Total number of solicitations received by the mobility agent.

faCOATable.name: faCOATable
faCOATable.description: A table containing all of the care-of addresses (COAs) supported by the foreign agent. New entries can be added to the table. The order of entries in the faCOATAble is also the order in which the COAs are listed in the Agent Advertisement.

faSupportedCOA.name: faSupportedCOA
faSupportedCOA.description: Care-of-address supported by this foreign agent.

faCOAStatus.name: faCOAStatus
faCOAStatus.description: The row status for COA entry.

faIsBusy.name: faIsBusy
faIsBusy.description: Whether or not the foreign agent is too busy to accept additional registrations. If true(1), the agent is busy and any Agent advertisements sent from this agent should have the 'B' bit set to 1.

faRegistrationRequired.name: faRegistrationRequired
faRegistrationRequired.description: Whether or not this foreign agent requires registration even from those mobile nodes that have acquired their own, colocated care-of address. If true(1), registration is required and any Agent Advertisements sent from this agent should have the 'R' bit set to 1.

faVisitorTable.name: faVisitorTable
faVisitorTable.description: A table containing the foreign agent's visitor list. The foreign agent updates this table in response to registration events from mobile nodes.

faVisitorIPAddress.name: faVisitorIPAddress
faVisitorIPAddress.description: Source IP address of visitor's Registration Request.

faVisitorHomeAddress.name: faVisitorHomeAddress
faVisitorHomeAddress.description: Home (IP) address of visiting mobile node.

faVisitorHomeAgentAddress.name: faVisitorHomeAgentAddress
faVisitorHomeAgentAddress.description: Home agent IP address for that visiting mobile node.

faVisitorTimeGranted.name: faVisitorTimeGranted
faVisitorTimeGranted.description: The lifetime in seconds granted to the mobile node for this registration. Only valid if faVisitorRegIsAccepted is true(1).

faVisitorTimeRemaining.name: faVisitorTimeRemaining
faVisitorTimeRemaining.description: The number of seconds remaining until the registration is expired. It has the same initial value as faVisitorTimeGranted, and is counted down by the foreign agent.

faVisitorRegFlags.name: faVisitorRegFlags
faVisitorRegFlags.description: Registration flags sent by mobile node.

faVisitorRegIDLow.name: faVisitorRegIDLow
faVisitorRegIDLow.description: Low 32 bits of Identification used in that registration by the mobile node.

faVisitorRegIDHigh.name: faVisitorRegIDHigh
faVisitorRegIDHigh.description: High 32 bits of Identification used in that registration by the mobile node.

faVisitorRegIsAccepted.name: faVisitorRegIsAccepted
faVisitorRegIsAccepted.description: Whether the registration has been accepted or not. If it is false(2), this registration is still pending for reply.

faRegRequestsReceived.name: faRegRequestsReceived
faRegRequestsReceived.description: Total number of valid Registration Requests received.

faRegRequestsRelayed.name: faRegRequestsRelayed
faRegRequestsRelayed.description: Total number of Registration Requests relayed to home agent by foreign agent.

faReasonUnspecified.name: faReasonUnspecified
faReasonUnspecified.description: Total number of Registration Requests denied by foreign agent -- reason unspecified (Code 64).

faAdmProhibited.name: faAdmProhibited
faAdmProhibited.description: Total number of Registration Requests denied by foreign agent -- administratively prohibited (Code 65).

faInsufficientResource.name: faInsufficientResource
faInsufficientResource.description: Total number of Registration Requests denied by foreign agent -- insufficient resources (Code 66).

faMNAuthenticationFailure.name: faMNAuthenticationFailure
faMNAuthenticationFailure.description: Total number of Registration Requests denied by foreign agent -- mobile node failed authentication (Code 67).

faRegLifetimeTooLong.name: faRegLifetimeTooLong
faRegLifetimeTooLong.description: Total number of Registration Requests denied by foreign agent -- requested lifetime too long (Code 69).

faPoorlyFormedRequests.name: faPoorlyFormedRequests
faPoorlyFormedRequests.description: Total number of Registration Requests denied by foreign agent -- poorly formed request (Code 70).

faEncapsulationUnavailable.name: faEncapsulationUnavailable
faEncapsulationUnavailable.description: Total number of Registration Requests denied by foreign agent -- requested encapsulation unavailable (Code 72).

faVJCompressionUnavailable.name: faVJCompressionUnavailable
faVJCompressionUnavailable.description: Total number of Registration Requests denied by foreign agent -- requested Van Jacobson header compression unavailable (Code 73).

faHAUnreachable.name: faHAUnreachable
faHAUnreachable.description: Total number of Registration Requests denied by foreign agent -- home agent unreachable (Codes 80-95).

faRegRepliesRecieved.name: faRegRepliesRecieved
faRegRepliesRecieved.description: Total number of well-formed Registration Replies received by foreign agent.

faRegRepliesRelayed.name: faRegRepliesRelayed
faRegRepliesRelayed.description: Total number of valid Registration Replies relayed to the mobile node by foreign agent.

faHAAuthenticationFailure.name: faHAAuthenticationFailure
faHAAuthenticationFailure.description: Total number of Registration Replies denied by foreign agent -- home agent failed authentication (Code 68).

faPoorlyFormedReplies.name: faPoorlyFormedReplies
faPoorlyFormedReplies.description: Total number of Registration Replies denied by foreign agent -- poorly formed reply (Code 71).

haMobilityBindingTable.name: haMobilityBindingTable
haMobilityBindingTable.description: A table containing the home agent's mobility binding list. The home agent updates this table in response to registration events from mobile nodes.

haMobilityBindingEntry.name: haMobilityBindingEntry
haMobilityBindingEntry.description: An entry on the mobility binding list.

haMobilityBindingCOA.name: haMobilityBindingCOA
haMobilityBindingCOA.description: Mobile node's care-of-address. One mobile node can have multiple bindings with different care-of-addresses.

haMobilityBindingSourceAddress.name: haMobilityBindingSourceAddress
haMobilityBindingSourceAddress.description: IP source address of the Registration Request as received by the home agent. Will be either a mobile node's co-located care-of address or an address of the foreign agent.

haMobilityBindingRegFlags.name: haMobilityBindingRegFlags
haMobilityBindingRegFlags.description: Registration flags sent by mobile node.

haMobilityBindingRegIDLow.name: haMobilityBindingRegIDLow
haMobilityBindingRegIDLow.description: Low 32 bits of Identification used in that binding by the mobile node.

haMobilityBindingRegIDHigh.name: haMobilityBindingRegIDHigh
haMobilityBindingRegIDHigh.description: High 32 bits of Identification used in that binding by the mobile node.

haMobilityBindingTimeGranted.name: haMobilityBindingTimeGranted
haMobilityBindingTimeGranted.description: The lifetime in seconds granted to the mobile node for this registration.

haMobilityBindingTimeRemaining.name: haMobilityBindingTimeRemaining
haMobilityBindingTimeRemaining.description: The number of seconds remaining until the registration is expired. It has the same initial value as haMobilityBindingTimeGranted, and is counted down by the home agent.

haCounterTable.name: haCounterTable
haCounterTable.description: A table containing registration statistics for all mobile nodes authorized to use this home agent.

haCounterEntry.name: haCounterEntry
haCounterEntry.description: Registration statistics for one mobile node.

haServiceRequestsAccepted.name: haServiceRequestsAccepted
haServiceRequestsAccepted.description: Total number of service requests for the mobile node accepted by the home agent (Code 0 + Code 1).

haServiceRequestsDenied.name: haServiceRequestsDenied
haServiceRequestsDenied.description: Total number of service requests for the mobile node denied by the home agent (sum of all registrations denied with Code 128 through Code 159).

haOverallServiceTime.name: haOverallServiceTime
haOverallServiceTime.description: Overall service time (in seconds) that has accumulated for the mobile node since the home agent last rebooted.

haRecentServiceAcceptedTime.name: haRecentServiceAcceptedTime
haRecentServiceAcceptedTime.description: The time at which the most recent Registration Request was accepted by the home agent for this mobile node.

haRecentServiceDeniedTime.name: haRecentServiceDeniedTime
haRecentServiceDeniedTime.description: The time at which the most recent Registration Request was denied by the home agent for this mobile node.

haRecentServiceDeniedCode.name: haRecentServiceDeniedCode
haRecentServiceDeniedCode.description: The Code indicating the reason why the most recent Registration Request for this mobile node was rejected by the home agent.

haRegistrationAccepted.name: haRegistrationAccepted
haRegistrationAccepted.description: Total number of Registration Requests accepted by home agent (Code 0).

haMultiBindingUnsupported.name: haMultiBindingUnsupported
haMultiBindingUnsupported.description: Total number of Registration Requests accepted by home agent -- simultaneous mobility bindings unsupported (Code 1).

haReasonUnspecified.name: haReasonUnspecified
haReasonUnspecified.description: Total number of Registration Requests denied by home agent -- reason unspecified (Code 128).

haAdmProhibited.name: haAdmProhibited
haAdmProhibited.description: Total number of Registration Requests denied by home agent -- administratively prohibited (Code 129).

haInsufficientResource.name: haInsufficientResource
haInsufficientResource.description: Total number of Registration Requests denied by home agent -- insufficient resources (Code 130).

haMNAuthenticationFailure.name: haMNAuthenticationFailure
haMNAuthenticationFailure.description: Total number of Registration Requests denied by home agent -- mobile node failed authentication (Code 131).

haFAAuthenticationFailure.name: haFAAuthenticationFailure
haFAAuthenticationFailure.description: Total number of Registration Requests denied by home agent -- foreign agent failed authentication (Code 132).

haIDMismatch.name: haIDMismatch
haIDMismatch.description: Total number of Registration Requests denied by home agent -- Identification mismatch (Code 133).

haPoorlyFormedRequest.name: haPoorlyFormedRequest
haPoorlyFormedRequest.description: Total number of Registration Requests denied by home agent -- poorly formed request (Code 134).

haTooManyBindings.name: haTooManyBindings
haTooManyBindings.description: Total number of Registration Requests denied by home agent -- too many simultaneous mobility bindings (Code 135).

haUnknownHA.name: haUnknownHA
haUnknownHA.description: Total number of Registration Requests denied by home agent -- unknown home agent address (Code 136).

haGratuitiousARPsSent.name: haGratuitiousARPsSent
haGratuitiousARPsSent.description: Total number of gratuition ARPs sent by the home agent on behalf of mobile nodes.

haProxyARPsSent.name: haProxyARPsSent
haProxyARPsSent.description: Total number of proxy ARPs sent by the home agent on behalf of mobile nodes.

haRegRequestsReceived.name: haRegRequestsReceived
haRegRequestsReceived.description: Total number of Registration Requests received by home agent.

haDeRegRequestsReceived.name: haDeRegRequestsReceived
haDeRegRequestsReceived.description: Total number of Registration Requests received by the home agent with a Lifetime of zero (requests to deregister).

haRegRepliesSent.name: haRegRepliesSent
haRegRepliesSent.description: Total number of Registration Replies sent by the home agent.

haDeRegRepliesSent.name: haDeRegRepliesSent
haDeRegRepliesSent.description: Total number of Registration Replies sent by the home agent in response to requests to deregister.

mipAuthFailure.name: mipAuthFailure
mipAuthFailure.description: The mipAuthFailure indicates that the Mobile IP entity has an authentication failure when it validates the mobile Registration Request or Reply. Implementation of this trap is optional.

mipCompliance.name: mipCompliance
mipCompliance.description: The compliance statement for SNMPv2 entities which implement the Mobile IP MIB.

mipSystemGroup.name: mipSystemGroup
mipSystemGroup.description: A collection of objects providing the basic Mobile IP entity's management information.

mipSecAssociationGroup.name: mipSecAssociationGroup
mipSecAssociationGroup.description: A collection of objects providing the management information for security associations of Mobile IP entities.

mipSecViolationGroup.name: mipSecViolationGroup
mipSecViolationGroup.description: A collection of objects providing the management information for security violation logging of Mobile IP entities.

mnSystemGroup.name: mnSystemGroup
mnSystemGroup.description: A collection of objects providing the basic management information for mobile nodes.

mnDiscoveryGroup.name: mnDiscoveryGroup
mnDiscoveryGroup.description: A collection of objects providing management information for the Agent Discovery function within a mobile node.

mnRegistrationGroup.name: mnRegistrationGroup
mnRegistrationGroup.description: A collection of objects providing management information for the registration function within a mobile node.

maAdvertisementGroup.name: maAdvertisementGroup
maAdvertisementGroup.description: A collection of objects providing management information for the Agent Advertisement function within mobility agents.

faSystemGroup.name: faSystemGroup
faSystemGroup.description: A collection of objects providing the basic management information for foreign agents.

faAdvertisementGroup.name: faAdvertisementGroup
faAdvertisementGroup.description: A collection of objects providing supplemental management information for the Agent Advertisement function within a foreign agent.

faRegistrationGroup.name: faRegistrationGroup
faRegistrationGroup.description: A collection of objects providing management information for the registration function within a foreign agent.

haRegistrationGroup.name: haRegistrationGroup
haRegistrationGroup.description: A collection of objects providing management information for the registration function within a home agent.

haRegNodeCountersGroup.name: haRegNodeCountersGroup
haRegNodeCountersGroup.description: A collection of objects providing management information for counters related to the registration function within a home agent.

mipSecNotificationsGroup.name: mipSecNotificationsGroup
